name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (LukasRimk)
description:
This is a free game, which was made for a University project.

The goal in the game is simple - all you have to do is to is escape the dungeon. But is it so easy to achieve it? 

Each level has its own futures, new monsters, etc. To pass the level you have to obtain the key first, then you are able to pass to the next level.

The game ends, when you defeat the boss and steal his key for the doors of the dungeon.

Controls:

  • Use W A S D to move
  • Use MOUSE as a lantern
  • Use MOUSE BUTTON 1 to interact
  • Use X  for saving the game
  • Use C for fast loading the game
